name: Head Ache (GMTK 2019)
description:
Head Ache

Head Ache was built over a 48 hour period for GMTK Game Jam 2019

THEME: ONLY ONE

Story

The game takes place in the mind of a man named Scott. He is a broken man. If he is ever to escape the confines of his own mind he will need to take care of himself and defeat his own inner negativity.

The only character in the game is Scott.

Controls 

Note: This game requires a keyboard to play

MovementArrow KeysAction ButtonEnter

Credits

  • Stephen (Scripting)
  • Ellie (Assets)
